structural_note: This chapter has no traditional avatars. The two souls from Ch24 (Silex/Lith) have merged into a collective 'we' navigating the formless realms. The profile tracks what persists, what dissolves, and what emerges across five sections.

notes: This profile tracks transformation across five sections rather than static character traits. Traditional avatar categories (name, occupation, appearance) do not apply to formless beings. The 'character' is the WE—the merged perspective—and its evolution toward what they're becoming: the seed of Maitreya.
